title: [SOLVED]820-3115-B No WLan hardware installed.
message:
Laptop had a cup of coffee dumped on it by a feline villain.

Managed to get it back up and running, but it is reporting no WiFi hardware. Have tested with a known good card & cable.

PP3V3_WLAN:Probe 1508 = 3.317 

L3501::All Pins = 1.5mV

C3522 == 3.317

L3504::Pin1 & 2 == 3.317

C3521 == 3.317

C3520 == 3.3137

Q3550::Pin 1 == 3.315
Q3550::Pin 2 == 3.315
Q3550::Pin 3 == 1.8mV
Q3550::Pin 4 == 3.315

C3550 == 3.315
C3551 == 3.315
R3550 == 1.8mV & 32kOhms
R3551::Pin 1 == 3.315 & Pin 2 = 1.8mV   & 10k Ohms.
Q7921::Pin 1 == 3.315

The coffee wasn't around this area though, it was more around the bios area. Maybe that gives a clue.

Thanks in advance for the suggestions! :)

title: [SOLVED]820-3115-B No WLan hardware installed.
message: Pin 4 and 7 of U3540? Check connector closely for damage.

title: [SOLVED]820-3115-B No WLan hardware installed.
message:
U3540::Pin4 == 3.3v
U3540::Pin7 == 2.4mV

Everything looks nice and tidy in the general area. The connector looks good as well. I just tested with another cable again.

title: [SOLVED]820-3115-B No WLan hardware installed.
message: U3540 has a pull-up resistor on pin 7 to PP3V3_WLAN_F (R3553)....  Check if it is present, also doble check connector or maybe U3540 is shorted and pulling down the voltage......

title: [SOLVED]820-3115-B No WLan hardware installed.
message: How can I check if U3540 is pulling down?

title: [SOLVED]820-3115-B No WLan hardware installed.
message: Measure in diode mode, red probe to ground and black on pin 7, report value....

title: [SOLVED]820-3115-B No WLan hardware installed.
message:
It should be low with airport connected and high with disconnected.

Check on diode mode:
L3501 pin 1,4
C3530/31 both sides
R3510/11 both sides

title: [SOLVED]820-3115-B No WLan hardware installed.
message:
L3501::1 = 0.324
L3501::2 = 0.319

C3530 & C3531 are missing off the board.
Checked on a donor 3115-B and it has those two capacitors. Going to do a transplant and report back.

I must have knocked them off the board because they were measured above....

title: [SOLVED]820-3115-B No WLan hardware installed.
message:
So I replaced C3530 and C3531 and the wifi works, I must have knocked them off at some stage.

Thanks Dukefawks.


Close and mark solved please.
I can't work out how to close a thread.
